channel.title: Monolith - From us to you *OLDSCHOOL RS*
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b]What is Monolith[/b][/size] Monolith is a friendly and active RuneScape privateserver, aiming to be the best RS PS. We're striving to have the best content on our server and we'd always love to get input from our users, so the server can reflect the needs of the community. We're updating the server frequently and we gain great pleasure in doing so.
Us the developers will be online on the server alot, as we're also just gamers who want to be on the best server out there. We always love to help you, answer questions and we're open to suggestions and ideas.
So join us now in the start and be a part of building up the greatest RuneScape privateserver out there! What are you waiting for?
[size=14pt][b]Features[/b][/size] √ Flawless PvP √ Multi and single pk areas (Bounty Hunter and normal PvP included) √ Flawless skilling (With hunter and construction) √ God Wars √ Monsters: Dagganoth, King Black Dragon, Sea Troll, Barrelchest √ Mini games (Barrows, Castle Wars, Pest Control, Barbarrian Assault, Duel Arena, Tzhaar Cave, Fishing Trawler and so on) √ Rune crossbow with random bolt specials √ Ice barrages is multi in multi zones √ Godswords and dark bows with specs √ All Skill Capes √ Clan Chat √ FREQUENT UPDATES
We're currently working on a webclient, forums and highscores.
[url=https://imageshack.com/i/f0rADNPgp][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/xq90/540/rADNPg.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://imageshack.com/i/pbnnwfBCp][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/xq90/911/nnwfBC.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://imageshack.com/i/pbV9dBQVp][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/xq90/911/V9dBQV.png[/img][/url]
See you online!

item.title: Monolith - From us to you *OLDSCHOOL RS*
item.dc:creator: @Big_Beard Big Beard
item.description:
@Big_Beard wrote:

[size=14pt]What is Monolith[/size]
Monolith is a friendly and active RuneScape privateserver, aiming to be the best RS PS. We’re striving to have the best content on our server and we’d always love to get input from our users, so the server can reflect the needs of the community. We’re updating the server frequently and we gain great pleasure in doing so.

Us the developers will be online on the server alot, as we’re also just gamers who want to be on the best server out there. We always love to help you, answer questions and we’re open to suggestions and ideas.

So join us now in the start and be a part of building up the greatest RuneScape privateserver out there! What are you waiting for?

[size=14pt]Features[/size]
√ Flawless PvP
√ Multi and single pk areas (Bounty Hunter and normal PvP included)
√ Flawless skilling (With hunter and construction)
√ God Wars
√ Monsters: Dagganoth, King Black Dragon, Sea Troll, Barrelchest
√ Mini games (Barrows, Castle Wars, Pest Control, Barbarrian Assault, Duel Arena, Tzhaar Cave, Fishing Trawler and so on)
√ Rune crossbow with random bolt specials
√ Ice barrages is multi in multi zones
√ Godswords and dark bows with specs
√ All Skill Capes
√ Clan Chat
√ FREQUENT UPDATES

We’re currently working on a webclient, forums and highscores.

See you online!
